answers.answer: Hey Ezra868.Welcome tot he forum.Probable causes are too many. question: I have a lot of regular stomach "explosions" that are like gas wanting to escape but that stays in my stomach. I think it might be linked to excessive oil and fats from mince meat (I only notice it after eating mince) but was wondering if it could also be an inherited condition. My mother had kidney and liver issues, diabetes, gastro and gall bladder issues as well as fluid retention issues. Is there any way I can find out the cause of these painful and loud gas explosions in my stomach?
title: Gas explosions in my stomach... unknown cause?
